headline: US oil futures rise as API shows larger crude build, but product inventories fall
summary: Investing.com -- U.S. crude oil futures rose from post-settlement levels Tuesday after the American Petroleum Institute reported a mix inventory report as weekly domestic crude inventories increased by more than expected, but product stockpiles including gasoline slipped.

content.title: US oil futures rise as API shows larger crude build, but product inventories fall
content.summary: Investing.com -- U.S. crude oil futures rose from post-settlement levels Tuesday after the American Petroleum Institute reported a mix inventory report as weekly domestic crude inventories increased by more than expected, but product stockpiles including gasoline slipped.
